subtitle: This deliciously healthy recipe is a meal by itself.

method.text: Place the lentils in a pan of cold water. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 20-30 min until tender. Drain well.
Meanwhile, place all the dressing ingredients in a food processor and process until smooth. Set aside.
Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the shallots, garlic, chilli, fennel and orange rind. Fry for 5 min until golden.
Add the lentils to the pan with the stock and orange juice. Cover and simmer for 5 min. Add the spinach. Cook until just wilted. Season to taste.
Divide the mixture between serving plates. Top with the smoked mackerel. Pour 1-2 tablespoons of the dressing over each plate and serve.

title: Smoked mackerel with hot lentil salad
